title: STM32-Based IoT Framework for Real-Time Environmental Monitoring and Wireless Node Synchronization
authors: Ahmed Faizul Haque Dhrubo, et al.
abstract: This paper presents a comprehensive IoT framework built on STM32 microcontrollers for real-time environmental monitoring with advanced wireless node synchronization capabilities.

title: Early Detection of Lung Cancer Using Pyramid Vision Transformer (PVT v2): A Comparative Analysis of Deep Learning Models
authors: Ahmed Faizul Haque Dhrubo, et al.
abstract: A comprehensive study comparing deep learning models for early lung cancer detection, with Pyramid Vision Transformer v2 achieving state-of-the-art performance.

title: Optimizing Multimodal Transformers for Medical Image Captioning: Enhancing Automated Descriptions via AI Systems
authors: Ahmed Faizul Haque Dhrubo, et al.
abstract: Advanced multimodal transformer architectures for automated medical image captioning, improving clinical workflow efficiency through AI-powered descriptions.

title: IoT Towers of Resilience: Weathering Climate Extremes in Vulnerable Ecosystems
authors: Ahmed Faizul Haque Dhrubo, et al.
abstract: Innovative IoT infrastructure designed to withstand extreme climate conditions while monitoring vulnerable ecosystems in real-time.

title: Portable & Cost-Effective System for Real-Time Air Quality Monitoring and Environmental Impact Assessment
authors: Ahmed Faizul Haque Dhrubo, et al.
abstract: Development of an affordable, portable air quality monitoring system for comprehensive environmental impact assessment in urban and rural settings.

title: CarKoto: AI-Powered Platform for Transparent Used Car Price Prediction in Bangladesh
authors: Ahmed Faizul Haque Dhrubo, et al.
abstract: Machine learning-driven platform providing transparent and accurate used car price predictions tailored for the Bangladeshi automotive market.

title: Multi-Model AI-Driven Satellite Image Segmentation for Urbanization & Environmental Degradation Analysis
authors: Ahmed Faizul Haque Dhrubo, et al.
abstract: Advanced satellite image segmentation techniques using multiple AI models to analyze urban development patterns and environmental degradation.

title: Multi-Model AI of Satellite Image Processing for Enhanced Urban Development Analysis
authors: Ahmed Faizul Haque Dhrubo, et al.
abstract: Comprehensive satellite image processing framework using multiple AI models for detailed urban development analysis and planning.

title: Harnessing Technology for Climate Resilience: Eco-friendly Cooler
authors: Ahmed Faizul Haque Dhrubo, et al.
abstract: Innovative eco-friendly cooling system design leveraging advanced technologies for sustainable climate resilience solutions.
